name: Centrus Energy Corp.
description: Centrus Energy Corp. is a global leader in the nuclear fuel industry, specializing in the production and supply of low-enriched uranium (LEU). Established in 1998 and headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, the company plays a crucial role in providing fuel for commercial nuclear power plants, which are vital for generating clean energy. Centrus offers a range of services, including uranium enrichment, fuel fabrication, and technical support, catering to the growing demand for safe, reliable, and sustainable energy solutions. With a focus on innovation, Centrus operates advanced enrichment technologies and has been pivotal in the development of new methods to enhance efficiency and reduce costs in the production of nuclear fuel. The company is committed to environmental stewardship and ensuring that nuclear energy remains a critical component of the global energy mix. Centrus is actively involved in efforts to advance the nuclear industry, including supporting the development of small modular reactors (SMRs) and other next-generation technologies. As the world increasingly turns to carbon-free energy sources, Centrus Energy Corp. is positioned to lead the way in providing the necessary fuel for a sustainable energy future.
